author: orbis
title: Orbis: Layer 2 ZK Rollup
description: Cardano can't scale to support millions of users and currently proposed scaling solutions make compromises on security and decentralization.

author: murdocisgod
title: using games to scale audience
description: ADA needs to scale. A fun shooting game will bring in a larger gaming community to help scale.

author: konmaorg
title: KONMA Chain : L2 ZK Roll up for ADA
description: Konma's web3 products and other projects being deployed on the Cardano chain will inevitably crowd the network and compromise scalability.

author: otaviolima
title: ADA Scam Alert - Info & Protection
description: Where to find reliable, secure and credible information about the trust, professionalism, technique and seriousness of blockchain projects.

author: tienna
title: Simplify SPO rollups in Vietnam
description: Most of the stake pools are running on common hosting providers (AWS, GCP, Azure). we need a self-reliant network rather than it is now.

author: mpn
title: Perun Channels for Cardano
description: Cardano does not have a deployed state channel framework, yet. The Hydra protocol is still WIP.

author: rmbrt
title: Erdstall: instant TXs, L2 NFT mints
description: Cardano's TX throughput is insufficient for mass adoption and it has no instant transaction mechanism for responsive, non-custodial DEXes.

author: nicoarqueros
title: Layer 3 scalability using zkRollups
description: zk-rollups using validity proofs are currently the most likely solutions that will help scale up blockchains. Cardano is missing this so far

author: rg.admin
title: Research Guild: Scalability Report
description: Cardano values academic rigor; however, the Catalyst community lacks coordinated and skilled research that focuses on scalability.

author: abehazbunjr
title: A Scalable Service For NFT Utility
description: Creators and merchants alike face a high tech barrier to adding utility to native tokens, and much code is reinvented by each project.

author: younchanjung
title: A region-based sharded network
description:
Increasing the block size or reducing the block creation cycle cannot solve the scalability issue.
A network-based sharding is necessary.

author: pintbeerhouse
title: BeerHouse.io
description: Today has only two ways to view your portfolio, technical sites like cardanoscan or using wallets like yoroi (not recommended for view only)

author: dao.coders
title: DAO-NET & A2T Sidechain Design
description: DAO-NET & A2T will require extensive transactions that will be computationally intensive and expensive as the products scale.

author: alfred.pham
title: DEFI SHOULD BE MORE FUN ON SCALING
description: The ecosystem needs new DeFi models to "play"

author: c
title: Decentralized REDIS state channels
description: dApp developers and users need access to low-latency, distributed data storage for high-performance interactive dApps.

author: williamofthesun
title: Ada's Place - A Medium Publication
description: Scalability requires diversity in outreach. The greater the SEO, the easier it is to reach a potential audience.
